blocks.name: bcpascm1
blocks.content: Pascal's rule for the binomial coefficient, generalized to all integers ` K ` , shifted down by 1. (Contributed by AV, 8-Sep-2019.)

blocks.name: altgsumbc
blocks.content: The sum of binomial coefficients for a fixed positive ` N ` with alternating signs is zero. Notice that this is not valid for ` N = 0 ` (since ` ( ( -u 1 ^ 0 ) x. ( 0 _C 0 ) ) = ( 1 x. 1 ) = 1 ` ). For a proof using Pascal's rule ( ~ bcpascm1 ) instead of the binomial theorem ( ~ binom ) , see ~ altgsumbcALT . (Contributed by AV, 13-Sep-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm altgsumbc(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c0), co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cv(s0)), cmul, co(c0, cbc, cv(s0)))), nat0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  3eqtr3rd(csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c0), co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cv(s0)), cmul, co(c0, cbc, cv(s0)))), nat0, co(nat0, cexp, c0), co(co(nat1, caddc, cneg(nat1)), cexp, c0), wcel(c0, cn))
  oveq1d(nat0, cexp, c0, co(nat1, caddc, cneg(nat1)), wcel(c0, cn))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(nat0, co(nat1, caddc, cneg(nat1))), wcel(nat1, cc))
  eqcomd(nat0, co(nat1, caddc, cneg(nat1)), wcel(nat1, cc))
  negid(nat1)
  0exp(c0)
  eqtrd(co(co(nat1, caddc, cneg(nat1)), cexp, c0), csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c0), co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cv(s0)), cmul, co(c0, cbc, cv(s0)))), csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c0), co(co(c0, cbc, cv(s0)), cmul, co(co(nat1, cexp, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, cn))
  syl3anc(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(co(co(nat1, caddc, cneg(nat1)), cexp, c0), csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c0), co(co(c0, cbc, cv(s0)), cmul, co(co(nat1, cexp, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cv(s0)))))), wcel(nat1, cc), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc), wcel(c0, cn0))
  negcld(nat1, wcel(c0, cn))
  1cnd(wcel(c0, cn))
  binom(s0, nat1, cneg(nat1), c0)
  sumeq2dv(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c0), co(co(c0, cbc, cv(s0)), cmul, co(co(nat1, cexp, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cv(s0)))), co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cv(s0)), cmul, co(c0, cbc, cv(s0))), wcel(c0, cn))
  eqtrd(co(co(c0, cbc, cv(s0)), cmul, co(co(nat1, cexp, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cv(s0)))), co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cv(s0)), cmul, co(c0, cbc, cv(s0))), co(co(c0, cbc, cv(s0)), cmul, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0))))
  oveq2d(co(c0, cbc, cv(s0)), cmul, co(co(nat1, cexp, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cv(s0))), co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0))))
  eqtrd(co(co(nat1, cexp, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cv(s0))), co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cv(s0)), co(nat1, cmul, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0))))
  oveq1d(co(nat1, cexp, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cv(s0)), nat1, wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0))), wceq(co(nat1, cexp, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))), nat1), wcel(co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)), cz))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)), cz), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  nnz(c0)
  zsubcl(c0, cv(s0))
  1exp(co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)))
  mulid2d(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0))))
  mulcomd(co(c0, cbc, cv(s0)), co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0))))
  nn0cnd(co(c0, cbc, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0))))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(co(c0, cbc, cv(s0)), cn0), wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  nnnn0(c0)
  elfzelz(cv(s0), nat0, c0)
  bccl(c0, cv(s0))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cv(s0)), cc), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc), wcel(cv(s0), cn0))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc))
  neg1cn()
  elfznn0(cv(s0), c0)
  expcl(cneg(nat1), cv(s0))
  diff.cneg.s(s0, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cfz, c0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cn)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: altgsumbcALT
blocks.content: Alternate proof of ~ altgsumbc , using Pascal's rule ( ~ bcpascm1 ) instead of the binomial theorem ( ~ binom ). (Contributed by AV, 8-Sep-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:

  diff.hs0.c(co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1)), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cbc, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1))))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat1, cfz, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cbc, co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1))))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cfz, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, nat0), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cbc, co(nat0, cmin, nat1)))
  diff.co.s(s0, cneg(nat1), cexp, nat0)
  diff.cexp.s(s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, co(c0, cmin, nat1), cbc, co(nat0, cmin, nat1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cmin, nat1)
  diff.cbc.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cmin, nat1)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, co(nat0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, caddc, nat1)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}
